Description: On I-64 at mile marker 291.7 in the City of Chesapeake, near 464 Interchange, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The east left shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 15.6 in the County of Alleghany, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle fire. The east right lane and right shoulder are closed.

Description: On Rt. 757 East in the County of Bedford, in the vicinity of Turner Branch Rd; Rt. 619E/W (Bedford County), motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. Lane closures exist.
